E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Al Martin
Dear Sir,
Al Martin has nothing more to prove at A Spartanburg Phillies!
He has an AVG of .350 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Monday, 5/19/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Steve Brown



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1989
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Jamie Quirk



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1989
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Glenn Davis
